title: The Great Wall
writer: Carlo Bernard, Doug Miro, Tony Gilroy
short_cast: Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal, Jing Tian, Willem Dafoe, Zhang Hanyu, Lu Han, Eddie Peng, Lin Gengxin, Karry Wang, Zheng Kai, Huang Xuan, Andy Lau
cast: Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal, Jing Tian, Willem Dafoe, Zhang Hanyu, Lu Han, Eddie Peng, Lin Gengxin, Karry Wang, Zheng Kai, Huang Xuan, Andy Lau
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: Searching for gunpowder in Song dynasty China, European mercenaries discover an epic war being waged between the country's heroes and savage monsters.
